name: The Crate Escape
description:
2 Player Game.

Player 1 - Left Side - Use WASD

Player 2 - Right Side - Use arrow keys

Battle your way across the board to collect the most points.
Green goo is delicious and you get points for eating this delictable goo.
Purple goo is your gourmet goo, and gives you a small speed boost.
Red goo is the most wicked of goo and slows you down.

There could be purple and red hiding inside some of the greens, so be careful!
